en-US: We've been there too - staring at empty wallets, rationing coffee, and praying for payday.  If donating isn't an option right now, flip these task cards and discover how you can still be a hero. After all, we are all in this together, aren't we?
zh-CN: 我们也去过那里  - 盯着空空的钱包，节约咖啡，祈祷发薪日的到来。如果现在不能捐款，请翻转这些任务卡片，看看你仍然可以如何成为英雄。毕竟，我们都是一起走过来的，不是吗？
